name: Brain Brawl
description:
(Local multiplayer only, no single player)

Psychics use brainwaves in an attempt to control their opponent and submit them. Players battle with pattern based attacks to weaken the rival and can defend themselves by reversing the pattern used against them.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2017 under the theme "Waves" (Source code in the link)
